Module it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher
Package it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.server.view

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.utils.obs.Observable<ClientMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.triton.launcher.server.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Observer<InfoMessage>
public class VirtualView extends Observable<ClientMessage> implements View, Observer<InfoMessage>
This class is used by the server to call view methods. Each method of the virtual view allows the server to send a message to the client that has to reply to the request.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(InfoMessage message)
      Receives a message from Game by notification. Manages the message using Visitor Patter. Sends the message to Client using Visitor Pattern.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<InfoMessage>
      Parameters:
      message - received from the Game

    • reSendLastCharacterCardMessage

      public void reSendLastCharacterCardMessage()

    • sendAndSave

      private void sendAndSave(AskMessage askMessage)
      This method saves the last message for two reasons: first, when a request for character card use is received, the Server can ask the previous request again. Secondly, when the Server receives a message it can check if it is the expected message based on the message sent previously. Eventually, sends the message to the client using ServeOneClient class.
      Parameters:
      askMessage - the request Message to save and send to Client.

    • askNumPlayersAndGameMode

      public void askNumPlayersAndGameMode()
      Sends a message to ask the first player how many player wants in the game and the game mode.
      Specified by:
      askNumPlayersAndGameMode in interface View

    • askAssistantCard

      public void askAssistantCard()
      Sends a message to the current player to ask which assistant card wants to play. It also saves this message in lastMessage in order to repeat the request if the player chooses to play a character card.
      Specified by:
      askAssistantCard in interface View

    • askCloudTile

      public void askCloudTile()
      Sends a message to the current player to ask which cloud tile wants. It also saves this message in lastMessage in order to repeat the request if the player chooses to play a character card.
      Specified by:
      askCloudTile in interface View

      Specified by:

      public void askNumberStepsMotherNature()

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • askCharacterCardParameters

      public void askCharacterCardParameters(int id)
      Sends a message to the current player to ask which cloud tile wants. It also saves this message in lastCharacterCardMessage in order to repeat the request if an error occurs during the execution.
      Specified by:
      askCharacterCardParameters in interface View
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the character card the player wants to play.
